speaker.whotheyare: TED Senior Fellow Usman Riaz is an artist and composer.
speaker.whylisten: Usman Riaz is the founder of Mano Animation Studios -- Pakistans first hand-drawn animation studio. Their first project, The Glassworker (شیشہ گر), was created by a team of creatives from Pakistan, Malaysia, Canada, South Africa, the US and the UK.
